comments.body:
You will have to use TS 3.5 when using the `Omit` 
https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/release-notes/typescript-3-5.html#the-omit-helper-type
Is that OK? If so, just update the header and this would remove most of the lint errors
i think adding the custom omit type for compatibility is the better way. so I added the one.
